content: In fashion history, who is the French designer famous for her little black dress, Chanel No. 5 perfume, and the brand she founded in 1910?

The French designer you're referring to is Coco Chanel, whose real name is Gabrielle Bonheur Chanel. She is indeed renowned for creating the "little black dress" and developing the iconic Chanel No. 5 perfume. Chanel founded her fashion house in 1910, which has since become one of the most recognizable and influential brands in the world of fashion. Her designs revolutionized women's fashion by introducing comfortable and practical clothing that departed from the restrictive styles of the time.
